fields.name: Technical
fields.description: Ask the community about fixing, modifying or setting up your bike

fields.name: Buying and Selling
fields.description: What bike do you go for next time and how not to get ripped off.

fields.name: Clothing
fields.description: Tell everyone about your new boots, or find out what waterproofs are actually waterproof.

fields.name: Bike Accessories
fields.description: Find out here what's worth spending your money on and what isn’t

fields.name: Ride-outs
fields.description: Plan your meet-ups and ride outs and laugh about them afterwards.

fields.name: Touring and Travel
fields.description: Share advice and tips, routes with great roads and biker-friendly digs to stay at

fields.name: General
fields.description: If there isn’t a suitable section for your thread, leave it here.
